name: Improved Charging Hurler

sections.body: When you use Charging Hurler, your target can be at any range up to your weapon's maximum range. If your target is within 30 feet, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Using Charging Hurler requires you to end your movement within 30 feet of your opponent.
sections.name: Normal

description: Every muscle in your body adds its force to your thrown weapons.
